title: Wall Street Breakfast March 18: German Bank Giants In Merger Talks
author: Seeking Alpha

description: Our top stories today: German bank giants in merger talks; US futures open mixed with potential catalysts ahead; and Fidelity National Information Services to buy payment processor Worldpay. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
